supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-18 (in mm), (1) 9 x 53, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 30 x 23, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (3) 41 x 41, (A) 2 lines, top left margins, (B) blank, (4) 32 x 30, (A) 4 lines, top right margins, (B) blank, (5) 34 x 22, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (6) 46 x 20, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 10 lines, no margins, (7) 14 x 40, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 20 x 26, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 22 x 56, (A) 1 line, no margins, (B) traces, (10) 31 x 30, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (11) 33 x 14, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 34 x 19, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 3 lines, (13) 62 x 11, (A) 7 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (14) 73 x 13, (A) 8 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (15) 66 x 21, (A) 5 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (16) 55 x 33, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (17) 70 x 19, (A) 4 lines, top (?) margin, (B) blank, (18) 63 x 19, (A) 1 line, bottom margin, (B) blank

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
